page.title: 10STREETS AND HOUSES viii.
page.content:
Broad St./Doddington Rd.
Broad St. links Doddington Rd. to the Square.In Broad St.are several small shops- greengrocers,florists,and ladies clothes; the Methodist Church, the Library and the schools.There is a small public car park which serves a shoe factory.Otherwise the street is residential with brick built houses. Doddington Rd. contains one large shoe factory,one electrical factory, one small shop and a small estate of sheltered housing for the elderly.Otherwise there is modern , mostly detached private housing.
